summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 22 October to end of Saturday 23 October GMT
description: Bright with sunny spells Friday, isolated showers for a time and winds easing.<br/>Saturday forecast to be mainly dry but overcast with winds start arriving from south west. <br/><br/>Weather arriving from the Atlantic. The resulting winds will give good atmospheric mixing and quick dispersal of local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
